channel.title: The Lean Startup Builds on the Work of Some Other Very Smart People
channel.description:
Eric Ries releases his new book 'The Startup Way' this month. To celebrate, we're looking back at his previous book, the New York Times Bestseller and instantly familiar 'The Lean Startup'. We've dug through the Business of Software archives to find a bunch of talks by people Eric cites as driving his thinking.
Amazing insights - check out the wealth of advice and knowledge in these talks.
http://businessofsoftware.org/2017/10/the-lean-startup-builds-on-the-work-of-some-other-very-smart-people/?utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=ERLeanOrigins&utm_source=DBfm
